name: myculinarycompass-web
description: This is a MERN stack web app for COP4331 at UCF Once the app is cloned, please setup .env file and run the command npm install in the root directory & in frontend directory.

scripts.install-client: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run install-client && npm run install-server
